description: A large elephant, dressed in a human-like coat and hat and holding a cane, stands in a park next to a tree. On a bench, a man casually eats nuts from a bag while two squirrels look on expectantly at his feet. The scene presents an absurd situation where a creature of immense size and distinct form is attempting to blend into a typical human environment. This juxtaposition highlights the surreal nature of the elephant's presence and its apparent attempt at normalcy. The man's seemingly indifferent reaction further emphasizes the focus on the unexpected and the peculiar within an otherwise ordinary setting.
